description: This table contains details regarding claim codes attached to AP claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the code that is currently on the claim.

columns.name: ENTRY_DATE
columns.description: The date the claim code was added to the claim.

columns.name: EOB_CODE_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time this code was added to the claim.

columns.name: EOB_CODE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user who added the code to the claim.

columns.name: EOB_CODE_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment specified when the code was added to the claim.
